abstract: Synergies aside, is Rupert Murdoch’s $5 billion bid for Dow Jones & Company really about the media mogul’s desire to acquire the patina of respectability that has eluded him as he built his News Corporation empire?
lead_paragraph: Synergies aside, is Rupert Murdoch’s $5 billion bid for Dow Jones & Company really about the media mogul’s desire to acquire the patina of respectability that has eluded him as he built his News Corporation empire?

headline.main: In Chasing Dow Jones, What Does Murdoch Want?
